GHRAISONI_EXAMS_WINTER_2022.college_name: G. H. Raisoni College of Engineering, Nagpur
instructions: All questions carry marks as indicated.
Assume suitable data wherever necessary.
Due credit will be given to neatness and adequate dimensions.
Illustrate your answer wherever necessary with the help of neat sketches.
Use of non-programmable calculator is permitted.

questions.question_text: Describe the overall architecture of DBMS with neat diagram.
List the various users of DBMS and explain its functions. Also explain the roles & responsibilities of DBA.

Consider the relational schema:
Lives (person_name, street, city)
Works (person_name, company_name, salary)
Located-in (company_name, city)
Manages (person_name, manager_name)
Write SQL to find the following.
i) Find the name, street, city of all employees who work for 'IBM' and earn more than Rs. 15,000/-
ii) Find the name of all companies located in 'Nagpur'.
iii) Find those who lives and works in same city.
Define the following terms: (i) Candidate keys (ii) Super key (iii) Composite key (iv) Primary key (v) Foreign key.
Elaborate Normalization. Explain 1NF, 2NF and 3NF.
Compute the closure of the following set F of FD's for the relation R=(A,B,C,D,E) where F = {A->BC, CD->E, B->D, E->A}. List all candidate keys of R.
State the reasons for the occurrence of deadlock. Suggest its prevention method.
What is locking protocol? Explain two phase locking protocol with the help of example.
Give the case study on NoSQL.
Explain the different phases involved in Query processing.
What is Query Optimization? Give various techniques of Query Optimization.

GHRAISONI_EXAMS_WINTER_2022.college_name: G. H. Raisoni College of Engineering, Nagpur
instructions: All questions are compulsory and carry marks as indicated.
Assume suitable data wherever necessary.
Due credit will be given to neatness and adequate dimensions.
Illustrate your answer wherever necessary with the help of neat sketches.
Use of non-programmable calculator is permitted.

questions.question_text: Discuss the services provided by the operating system for efficient system operation.
Explain the System call with suitable example.
Illustrate the transitional changes in process states diagram when blocked suspended and ready suspended states are included.

Consider the set of 5 processes whose arrival time and burst time are given below. If the CPU scheduling policy is Round Robin with time quantum = 2 unit, calculate the average waiting time and average turnaround time.
Discuss the use of semaphores to deal with n-process critical section problem with a suitable example.
Explain the Producer-Consumer Problem.
Explain the Resource-Allocation Graph Algorithm for deadlock prevention.

A single processor system has three resource types X, Y and Z, which are shared by three processes. There are 5 units of each resource type. Consider the following scenario, where the column 'alloc' denotes the number of units of each resource type allocated to each process, and the column 'request' denotes the number of units of each resource type requested by a process in order to complete execution. Which of these processes will finish LAST?
State and explain various Page Replacement Algorithms used for Page Replacement.

Differentiate between:
i. Paging and segmentation
ii. Logical address and physical address

questions.question_text: State and Explain the Evolution of Data Science.
Discuss the Data Science Life Cycle.
Explain the various strategies of data collection techniques.
Elaborate and discuss the design steps to handle Missing data with an example.

Calculate the mean deviation and coefficient of mean deviation from (i) the mean, (ii) the median, in the ungrouped data case, of the following set of examination marks: Xi(45, 32, 37, 46, 39, 36, 41, 48, 36).
State the measures commonly employed to define Skewness and Kurtosis. What aspects of the frequency curve are measured by them?
Explain the Simple and Multiple Regression method.
What are the considerations in the fitting polynomial model?
Explain Evaluation Metrics in Model Evaluation?
Explain Under Fitting and Model Selection in the Model Evaluation.

questions.question_text: Explain with neat diagram Software process Layered Technology.
Explain Characteristics of Software Engineering.
Explain with neat diagram the business process model.
Explain cohesion and Coupling. Explain different types with detailed example.
Explain the process of CMM.
Explain Risk and its types?
Explain the role of architectural style and patterns.
What is Project Estimation? Discuss about FP based and LOC based estimation.
What is testing? What is the role of testing in software Engineering.
Difference between Black Box & White box Testing.

questions.question_text: Illustrate BI Architecture in detail using suitable diagram.
Discuss data analytic methods with tools.
List various Application of BI.
Elaborate data science process with neat labeled diagram.
Describe regression and discuss different types of regression.
Summarize the role of a business intelligence analyst.
Give the list top data visualization tools and explain any two tools.
List various types of Dashboard with its use.
Discuss how to record and Analyze Performance of dashboard.
Show how business metrics and KPIs works.
Construct cube using Microsoft Excel, discuss the process.

questions.question_text: Sketch the block diagram of Information Retrieval system and explain each block in details.
Illustrate inverted indexing and its significance in IR.
Write all the methodologies of text processing and query processing.
Describe Spam Filtering, state its types with example.
Comment on N-gram Model and its indices.
State the Heap's Law and Zipf's Law in detail and write its applications.
Describe the term Index Compression and Extreme Compression.
State the term spelling correction and explain the edit distance matrix algorithm for spelling correction.

Write a short note on (Any Two):
i) Micro- and macro-averaging
ii) Sentiment analysis on the Web
iii) Text Classification and Text Mining

GHRAISONI_EXAMS_WINTER_2022.college_name: G. H. Raisoni College of Engineering, Nagpur
instructions: All questions carry marks as indicated.
Assume suitable data wherever necessary & illustrate your answer wherever necessary with the help of neat sketches.
Due credit will be given to neatness and adequate dimensions.
Use of non-programmable calculator is permitted.

questions.question_text: Analyze DIBO differential amplifier circuit. Derive expression for gain & input resistance.

For SIBO differential amplifier shown in figure. Determine (a) Operating point, (b) Voltage gain, (c) Input Resistance, (d) Max. peak to peak output voltage. Assume β_ac=β_dc=100, V_BE=V_D1=0.7V, V_Z=6.2V & I_z=41mA.
questions.image_description: Circuit diagram of a Single-Input, Balanced-Output (SIBO) differential amplifier with transistors Q1, Q2, Q3, diodes D1, D2 and resistors R1, R2, R3, R4. Supply voltages are Vcc=10V and Vee=-10V.

questions.question_text: Design inverting amplifier and derive expression to find gain of inverting amplifier with feedback. The op-amp having the following parameter is connected as inverting amplifier with R1=1kΩ & Rf=10kΩ, A=200000, Ri=2MΩ, Ro=75Ω, f0=5hz & supply voltage=±15v, output voltage swing=±13v. Compute the value of Af & Rif.
Design summer amplifier circuit to solve following equation: V_o = 4V_1 + 5V_2 - 2V_3
Explain how output voltage Vo is calculated in ideal differentiator circuit. How problem of high frequency noise is overcome in differentiator?
Prove f_0 = 1 / (2π√(6)RC) in RC Phase Shift Oscillator.
Determine the order of low pass butterworth filter that provides 40db attenuation at f/f_H = 2.
Design circuit to convert AC signal to full wave DC signal. Also explain working of this circuit with waveforms.
Design positive clipper. Explain its working with proper waveforms.

For Schmitt trigger circuit, consider R1=100Ω, R2=56kΩ, Vin=1Vpp sine wave and opamp is of type 741 with supply voltage ±15V. Determine threshold voltages, Vut, Vlt & draw output waveform. Also draw hysteresis curve.
Draw a block schematic of PLL IC NE/SE 565 and describe its functions.
Design timer 555 used as a astable multivibrator to operate at 1KHz. Duty cycle is 40%. The timing capacitor used is 0.01µF. Assume necessary data required if any.

instructions: All questions carry marks as indicated.
Assume suitable data wherever necessary.

Solve any one from Q. No 5 b) or Q.No. 5 c).

questions.question_text: Write an algorithm for bubble sort also write a program to Implement using array.
Define Data Structure? List different type of data structure and operations performed on Data Structures.
Implement the Stack using array which will take 10 integers as input. Insert even elements in STACK1 and odd elements in STACK2.
Write note on circular linked list with example.

Create a single linked list for train reservation system which have all the train_id record of a train. The linked list must contain minimum three train_id. Perform the following operations:
a) Delete a train_id at any position in a given record
b) View all the train_id stored in a record
Discuss the advantages and disadvantages of linked list over the array.
What is Binary Trees? Write a program to Implement Insert & Delete an element in binary tree.
Mention the Graphs in Data Structures. Give terminologies involved in Graph. Elaborate with examples of traversing in graph.
Emphasize on Spanning Trees. Write an algorithm for Minimum spanning tree.
Give the real life example for application of each data structure.

GHRAISONI_EXAMS_WINTER_2022.college_name: G. H. Raisoni College of Engineering, Nagpur
instructions: All questions carry marks as indicated.
Assume suitable data wherever necessary & illustrate your answer wherever necessary with the help of neat sketches.
Due credit will be given to neatness and adequate dimensions.
Use of non-programmable calculator is permitted.

questions.question_text: Design Constant Current bias circuit using zener diode and derive output current equation.

The following specification is given for the dual input, balanced output differential amplifier: R_C=2.2kΩ, R_E=4.7kΩ, R_in1=R_in2=50Ω, +V_cc=10V, -V_EE=-10V and V_BE=0.715V.
a) Determine the ICQ and V_CEQ values.
b) Determine the voltage gain.
c) Determine the input and output resistance.

Design Non-inverting amplifier and derive expression to find gain of non-inverting amplifier with feedback. The op-amp having the following parameter R1=2kΩ & Rf=20kΩ, A=200000, Ri=2MΩ, Ro=75Ω, f0=5hz & supply voltage=±15V, output voltage swing=±13v. Compute the value of Af & Rif.
Explain how output voltage Vo is calculated in Basic Integrator circuit? Why practical Integrator is used in industry?
Design Wein Bridge oscillator using op-amp and explain its working.
Design a low pass filter for a cut-off frequency 5 kHz with a pass band gain of 2. Using the frequency scaling technique, redesign the filter for a cut-off frequency of 1.6 kHz.
Design and explain square wave generator using opamp.
Design positive clipper. Explain its working with proper waveforms.
For Schmitt trigger circuit, consider R1=120Ω, R2=47kΩ, Vin=1Vpp sine wave and opamp is of type 741 with supply Voltage ±15V. Determine threshold voltages, Vut, Vlt & draw output waveform.
Draw Voltage regulator and describe its functions.
Design timer 555 used as a astable multivibrator to operate at 2KHz. Duty cycle is 70%. The timing capacitor used is 0.01 µF. Assume necessary data required if any.
